journal.name: PlayerRoamingEnclaveAvailable
journal.chat_text: We have received blueprints as a gift from the Enclave on {PlanetName}.
journal.full_text:
We have been gifted blueprints for what appears to be a variant of a Roaming Enclave, modified for human use.
Based on these blueprints containing a large amount of hanger space, we believe building this ship will allow us direct control over our own Youngling swarm.
